/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to this tranquil setting. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall mood of the image is peaceful and serene, as if inviting the viewer to take a leisurely stroll down this picturesque street.
